sentences.sContent: Everyone is free to engage in peaceful political activity.
sentences.sCn: 每个人都可以自由参加和平的政治活动。

sentences.sContent: Regular physical activity helps to control your weight.
sentences.sCn: 定期参加体育活动有助于控制体重。

sentences.sContent: ...The participants each slept in the department for two nights and were carefully monitored with techniques that looked at the activity of their brains...
...When asked which activity would be the most difficult to give up for a week...
...What activity do teenagers find the most difficult to give up for a week...
...possibly via the activity of an appetite-controlling hormone...
...the most popular free time activity was eating out...
...The second most popular activity was driving...
...But women are more likely to accept government regulation and involvement in economic activity than our male colleagues...
...The most popular outdoor activity for Americans was gardening...
...The results of a Harry’s pool showed that reading was the most popular spare time activity in the US...
